metadata.name: Super Appeal
metadata.description:
• Passive • +1 Luck • Up to +1.5 additional Luck depending on room clear bonus • Can give Paper Isaac transformation • Repentance and multiplayer support
This item gives a +1 Luck up and an additional 0.1 Luck every time you clear a room. But be careful: taking damage removes 0.3 Luck from this bonus. This per-room bonus maxes out at 1.5 Luck and can't go below 0. In other words, you get a total +1 ~ +2.5 Luck up depending on your room bonus.
[u]Item Pools[/u] • Treasure Room • Boss
[u]Transformation[/u] • Paper Isaac
This item is also included in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1826418847]Paper Isaac modpack[/url].
